title: 80. The Candyman - Halloween Candy Craze
description:
On this episode of MWMH, Payton and Garrett discuss the origin of the halloween candy craze.

Case Sources:
https://www.aetv.com/real-crime/the-man-who-killed-halloween

https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/halloween-non-poisonings/

https://www.ctpost.com/news/article/Man-Who-Ruined-Halloween-Recounting-the-14663666.php#photo-7073983 

https://murderpedia.org/male.O/o1/obryan-ronald-clark.htm

https://www.vice.com/en/article/8ge87v/halloween-killer-ronald-clark-o-bryan-candy-man
